data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 2
data.actual_result: They seem to be sorted randomly.
data.expected_result: They should be sorted like in the Discord app.
data.short_description: New share extension: Channels and servers not sorted like in Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable the new Discord share extension - Go to Safari for example and open any website - Click on the share icon - Select Discord - Observe the sorting of the servers for `Share in` and the channels of the servers in `Share to`
